projectDescription: I developed a full-stack web application using React for a dynamic and responsive user interface, Node.js and Express.js for a robust backend, and MongoDB for scalable data storage. The app integrates Python scripts for data preprocessing, AWS for secure cloud storage with S3 buckets, and is deployed on Heroku with CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions to ensure continuous delivery and high performance.

I developed Cristaos, a full-stack web application, using React for an interactive user interface and Node.js/Express.js for the backend. The app supports real-time communication with Socket.IO, enabling live chat rooms and content sharing. It integrates MongoDB for flexible data storage and AWS S3 for secure image uploads. Deployed on Heroku, the app allows users to create blogs, share images, polls, and links, offering a seamless, dynamic experience across different content types.
La Union Tire Inc. is a tire shop with a landing page built using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. It provides essential information about services and invites visitors to explore further.

Weather Dashboard: A web application utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to fetch real-time weather data via the OpenWeatherMap API. Users can search cities, view climate information, revisit searches, and manage a history of previous queries.
